turkish_example_sentence: Biz turist rehberi olarak ziyaretçilere eski şehrin tarihi anlatırız.
english_example_sentence: We as tour guides tell visitors the history of the old city.
russian_example_sentence: Мы как туристические гиды рассказываем посетителям историю старого города.
